evidence_extraction:
[
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.]",
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: If you're black, you should be thinking black.]",
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: The white man today is without a weapon. If you want some action you've got to come on down to Earth, and there's more black people on Earth than there are white people.]",
  "[INDIVIDUAL_DIGNITY: We intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.]",
  "[INDIVIDUAL_DIGNITY: All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.]",
  "[INDIVIDUAL_DIGNITY: You and I have never seen democracy – all we've seen is hypocrisy.]",
  "[FEAR: racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.]",
  "[FEAR: churches are being bombed, whose little girls are being murdered, whose leaders are being shot down in broad daylight?]",
  "[FEAR: If you don't see it you're finished. If you don't see it you're going to become involved in some action in which you don't have a chance.]",
  "[HOPE: So today it's time to stop singing and start swinging.]",
  "[HOPE: The only way we're going to solve our problem is with a self-help program.]",
  "[HOPE: this country can become involved in a revolution that won't take bloodshed. All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.]",
  "[ENVY: The Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.]",
  "[ENVY: He made a chump out of you. He made a fool out of you. He made you think you were going somewhere and you end up going nowhere but between Lincoln and Washington.]",
  "[ENVY: The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...under the pretext that you want to integrate. Nah, you're out of your mind.]",
  "No direct evidence of mudita found. The discourse is adversarial towards the 'Man's' success.",
  "No explicit joy or celebration of others' (outside the black community) success is present in the text.",
  "[ENMITY: I see some enemies.]",
  "[ENMITY: Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape. When you — and he is your enemy.]",
  "[ENMITY: Not only is he a crook, he's a hypocrite. Here he is standing up in front of other people, Uncle Sam, with the blood of your and mine mothers and fathers on his hands. With the blood dripping down his jaws like a bloody-jawed wolf.]",
  "[AMITY: brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.]",
  "[AMITY: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.]",
  "[AMITY: I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom. Only, you think that integration will get you freedom; I think that separation will get me freedom. We both got the same objective, we just got different ways of getting' at it.]",
  "[FRAGMENTATIVE_GOALS: The time when white people can come in our community and get us to vote for them so that they can be our political leaders and tell us what to do and what not to do is long gone.]",
  "[FRAGMENTATIVE_GOALS: Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.]",
  "[FRAGMENTATIVE_GOALS: Only, you think that integration will get you freedom; I think that separation will get me freedom.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.]"
]
